Garbage Schedule Every Week

2023

Tue

Hey there, admin!

Reminder:
Brgy. Del Carmen, Brgy. Saray, Brgy. Tominobo Proper, and Brgy. Ubaldo Laya are the four scheduled barangays that should be visited every Tuesday of the week for garbage collection.

starting @ 7:30 am

Thu

Hey there, admin!

Reminder:
Brgy. Bagong Silang and Brgy. Del Carmen are the two scheduled barangays that should be visited every Thursday of the week for garbage collection.

starting @ 8:30 am

Fri

Hey there, admin!

Reminder:
Brgy. Saray and Brgy. Tominobo Proper are the two scheduled barangays that should be visited every Friday of the week for garbage collection.

starting @ 9:30 am
